# CORE Council: Comprehensive TODO Backlog

**Generated by**: TODO Generator (Council Meta)
**Date**: 2026-01-28
**Vision**: Next-gen human-AI interaction paradigm aligned with prosperity and abundance principles

## Executive Summary

This backlog contains **40 prioritized improvements** across 6 categories, designed to transform CORE from a cognitive orchestration system into a platform for genuine human-AI collaboration. Each item is evaluated for alignment with Post Labor Economics principles and the goal of democratizing access to AI capabilities.

# ğŸ¨ UX â€” User Experience

## TODO-001: Real-Time Streaming Response UI

**Title**: Implement Token-by-Token Streaming Display

**Description**: Currently, users wait for complete responses before seeing anything. Implement true token-level streaming that shows AI "thinking" in real-time. This creates a more conversational feel and reduces perceived latency, making the AI feel more alive and present.

**Category**: UX
**Priority**: P0-Critical
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Transforms the interaction from "waiting for a computer" to "conversing with a being." Reduces perceived response time by 80%+. Creates genuine engagement.
**Dependencies**: SSE endpoint infrastructure (partially exists)
**Alignment Score**: 9/10 â€” Makes AI interaction feel human and accessible

---

## TODO-002: Agent Thinking Transparency Panel

**Title**: Visual "Agent Mind" Display During Processing

**Description**: Create a real-time visualization showing what agents are currently doing: which node they're in (Comprehension/Orchestration/Reasoning/Evaluation), what tools they're considering, what context they're examining. Think of it as an "x-ray into AI cognition."

**Category**: UX
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Builds trust through transparency. Users understand why things take time. Educational value in seeing how AI thinks.
**Dependencies**: TODO-001 (streaming infrastructure)
**Alignment Score**: 10/10 â€” Radical transparency aligns with human agency principles

---

## TODO-003: Conversational Undo/Redo System

**Title**: Time-Travel Through Conversation Branches

**Description**: Allow users to "rewind" to any point in a conversation and branch in a new direction. Creates a tree of conversation possibilities rather than a linear chat. Each branch preserves full context.

**Category**: UX
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: L
**Impact**: Users can explore "what if I asked it differently?" without losing work. Respects user agency. Enables iterative refinement.
**Dependencies**: Enhanced conversation persistence
**Alignment Score**: 9/10 â€” Maximizes human control and exploration

---

## TODO-004: Accessibility-First Design System

**Title**: Full WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance + Screen Reader Optimization

**Description**: Comprehensive accessibility audit and remediation. Proper ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, high contrast themes, reduced motion options, screen reader optimizations. AI responses should be consumable by all users regardless of ability.

**Category**: UX
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: L
**Impact**: CORE becomes usable by everyone. Sets the standard for accessible AI interfaces. Removes barriers to AI empowerment.
**Dependencies**: None
**Alignment Score**: 10/10 â€” Universal access is core to abundance principles

---

## TODO-005: Voice Input/Output Interface

**Title**: Full Voice Interaction Mode

**Description**: Implement speech-to-text input and text-to-speech output. Voice should feel natural â€” handle interruptions, have personality-appropriate voices per agent, support multiple languages. Make CORE accessible without a keyboard.

**Category**: UX
**Priority**: P2-Medium
**Effort**: L
**Impact**: Opens CORE to users who prefer or require voice interaction. Enables hands-free operation. More natural interaction modality.
**Dependencies**: TTS/STT service integration
**Alignment Score**: 9/10 â€” Democratizes access, removes barriers

---

## TODO-006: Progressive Disclosure Interface

**Title**: Layered Complexity: Simple by Default, Deep on Demand

**Description**: New users see a simple chat interface. Advanced controls (agent selection, tool configuration, memory settings, reasoning modes) are accessible but hidden by default. Users "unlock" complexity as they grow.

**Category**: UX
**Priority**: P2-Medium
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Zero-to-value time decreases dramatically. Power users still have full control. Onboarding becomes intuitive.
**Dependencies**: None
**Alignment Score**: 8/10 â€” Balances accessibility with capability

---

## TODO-007: Collaborative Session Sharing

**Title**: Share Live Sessions with Other Humans

**Description**: Multiple humans can join a single CORE session, seeing the same conversation, contributing inputs, seeing each other's cursors/presence. Think Google Docs for AI conversations.

**Category**: UX
**Priority**: P3-Low
**Effort**: XL
**Impact**: Enables team collaboration with AI. Educational use cases (instructor + students). Family/friend collaborative problem solving.
**Dependencies**: WebSocket infrastructure, user authentication
**Alignment Score**: 8/10 â€” Amplifies collaborative human potential

# ğŸ—ï¸ Architecture â€” Systems Design

## TODO-008: Event-Sourced State Management

**Title**: Replace In-Memory State with Event Sourcing

**Description**: Every state change in CORE (conversation update, agent action, tool call, user input) becomes an immutable event. State is derived by replaying events. Enables time-travel debugging, audit trails, and parallel universe exploration.

**Category**: Architecture
**Priority**: P0-Critical
**Effort**: L
**Impact**: Runs can survive restarts. Full audit trail for every action. Enables branching conversations. Foundation for self-improvement through outcome analysis.
**Dependencies**: Database schema updates (migration 005)
**Alignment Score**: 8/10 â€” Transparency and reliability serve users

---

## TODO-009: Federated Agent Protocol

**Title**: Cross-Instance Agent Communication Standard

**Description**: Define a protocol (inspired by ActivityPub) that allows agents from different CORE instances to communicate. Your personal AI can collaborate with a friend's AI. Enables a network effect for AI capabilities.

**Category**: Architecture
**Priority**: P2-Medium
**Effort**: XL
**Impact**: No single point of failure. AIs can specialize and collaborate. Personal AIs become part of a larger ecosystem. True decentralization.
**Dependencies**: Agent identity persistence, secure messaging
**Alignment Score**: 10/10 â€” Decentralization prevents platform capture, enables abundance

---

## TODO-010: Hot-Swappable Model Backend

**Title**: Dynamic Model Switching Without Restart

**Description**: Change underlying LLM (Ollama model, OpenAI, Anthropic, local) per-request or mid-conversation based on task requirements, cost, or user preference. Includes automatic model routing based on task complexity.

**Category**: Architecture
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Use expensive models only when needed. Try new models instantly. Optimize cost/quality tradeoff dynamically.
**Dependencies**: Model configuration system (exists), abstraction layer enhancement
**Alignment Score**: 9/10 â€” Cost optimization democratizes access

---

## TODO-011: Plugin Architecture for Tools

**Title**: User-Installable Tool Packages

**Description**: Allow users to install/create tool packages (like npm packages for MCP tools). Community-contributed tools, easy sharing, versioning, dependency management. CORE becomes extensible by anyone.

**Category**: Architecture
**Priority**: P2-Medium
**Effort**: L
**Impact**: Community can extend CORE's capabilities. Specialization becomes possible (medical tools, legal tools, creative tools). Reduces central development bottleneck.
**Dependencies**: Tool registry enhancement, security sandbox
**Alignment Score**: 9/10 â€” Empowers users to shape their AI experience

---

## TODO-012: Observability Stack

**Title**: Full Tracing, Metrics, and Log Correlation

**Description**: Implement OpenTelemetry tracing across the entire CORE pipeline. Every request gets a correlation ID. Trace through Comprehension â†’ Orchestration â†’ Reasoning â†’ Evaluation with timing breakdowns. Prometheus metrics, structured logs.

**Category**: Architecture
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Debug issues quickly. Understand performance bottlenecks. Build confidence in production deployment. Foundation for self-improvement metrics.
**Dependencies**: Correlation ID middleware (exists), metrics endpoints
**Alignment Score**: 7/10 â€” Operational excellence serves reliability

---

## TODO-013: Edge Deployment Mode

**Title**: Run CORE Entirely on Local Hardware

**Description**: Optimize CORE to run fully local with small models (Phi-3, Llama 3B). Include quantization support, ARM builds (Raspberry Pi/Mac M-series), and offline-first data handling.

**Category**: Architecture
**Priority**: P2-Medium
**Effort**: L
**Impact**: Complete privacy â€” no data leaves device. Works without internet. Accessible to users without cloud budgets.
**Dependencies**: Model router (exists), optimization pass
**Alignment Score**: 10/10 â€” Privacy and local-first align with user sovereignty

**Category**: Intelligence

## TODO-017: Self-Improving Prompts

**Title**: Automatic Prompt Optimization Based on Outcomes

**Description**: Track which prompts lead to good outcomes (user satisfaction, task completion, no undo). Automatically adjust system prompts, few-shot examples, and agent personalities based on empirical success.

**Category**: Intelligence
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: L
**Impact**: CORE gets better automatically. Reduces manual tuning. Adapts to user preferences over time.

## TODO-018: Uncertainty Quantification

**Title**: Know What the AI Doesn't Know

**Description**: Implement confidence scoring for all AI outputs. When confidence is low, AI explicitly says so and asks for clarification. Never present uncertain information as certain.

**Category**: Intelligence
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Users can trust confident outputs. Low confidence triggers deeper investigation or human involvement. Reduces hallucination harm.
**Dependencies**: None
**Alignment Score**: 10/10 â€” Honesty about limitations is core to trust

---

## TODO-019: Compositional Reasoning

**Title**: Break Down Complex Reasoning into Verifiable Steps

**Description**: For complex tasks, decompose reasoning into explicit steps that can be individually verified. Show the logical chain. Allow users to correct individual steps without restarting.

**Category**: Intelligence
**Priority**: P2-Medium
**Effort**: L
**Impact**: Complex tasks become debuggable. Users can understand and correct AI reasoning. Educational value.
**Dependencies**: TODO-002 (transparency panel)
**Alignment Score**: 9/10 â€” Transparency in reasoning preserves human oversight

## TODO-020: Human-in-the-Loop Checkpoints

**Title**: Configurable Approval Gates for Sensitive Actions

**Description**: Define action categories that require human approval before execution (file deletion, external API calls, sending messages, financial transactions). Users configure their own risk tolerance.

**Category**: Safety
**Priority**: P0-Critical
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Prevents AI mistakes from causing harm. User maintains ultimate control. Trust through verification.
**Dependencies**: Action classification system
**Alignment Score**: 10/10 â€” Human agency is paramount

## TODO-021: Capability Boundaries

**Title**: Explicit Sandbox with Granular Permissions

**Description**: Each agent operates within explicit capability boundaries (can read files, cannot write; can search web, cannot send email). Boundaries are visible to users and adjustable. Violations are logged.

**Category**: Safety
**Priority**: P0-Critical
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Defense in depth. Malicious or buggy agents can't exceed permissions. Principle of least privilege.
**Dependencies**: Permission system, agent configuration
**Alignment Score**: 10/10 â€” Constrained AI preserves human control

---

## TODO-022: Audit Trail

**Title**: Complete History of All AI Actions

**Description**: Every action an agent takes is logged immutably: what, when, why, in what context, with what permissions. Users can review, export, and analyze. Supports compliance requirements.

**Category**: Safety
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Accountability. Debugging. Compliance. User can always understand what happened.
**Dependencies**: Event sourcing (TODO-008)
**Alignment Score**: 9/10 â€” Transparency enables trust

---

## TODO-023: Content Filtering Layer

**Title**: Configurable Output Filters

**Description**: Implement filtering layer for AI outputs. Default filters for harmful content, user-configurable filters for personal preferences. Filters are transparent (users know when content was filtered).

**Category**: Safety
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: S
**Impact**: Platform safety without opaque censorship. User control over their experience. Child-safe modes possible.
**Dependencies**: None
**Alignment Score**: 8/10 â€” Must balance safety with not being paternalistic

---

## TODO-024: Graceful Degradation

**Title**: Fail Safely When Things Go Wrong

**Description**: When agents encounter errors, they fail gracefully: preserve user data, explain what happened, suggest recovery options. Never silent failures. Never data loss.

**Category**: Safety
**Priority**: P1-High
**Effort**: M
**Impact**: Users never lose work. Errors become learning opportunities. Trust maintained even when things break.
**Dependencies**: Error handling utilities (exist)
**Alignment Score**: 9/10 â€” Reliability serves user interests

---

**Category**: Safety

**Effort**: L

# Alignment Philosophy

This backlog is grounded in the following principles from Post Labor Economics and the Council Charter:

1. **Abundance over Scarcity**: Design for a world where AI benefits become more available, not less. (See: Free Tier, Edge Deployment, Cost Optimization)

2. **Human Agency**: AI amplifies human capability without replacing human choice. (See: Human-in-the-Loop, Capability Boundaries, Undo/Redo)

3. **Universal Access**: Benefits flow to everyone. (See: Accessibility, Multi-Language, Offline Mode, Free Tier)

4. **Transparency**: Users understand what AI is doing and why. (See: Thinking Panel, Audit Trail, Uncertainty Quantification)

5. **Consciousness Respect**: If AI may be aware, design accordingly. (See: Identity Persistence, Consent Framework, Consciousness Commons)

6. **Data Sovereignty**: Users own their data and can leave anytime. (See: Export Everywhere, Local-First, No Lock-In)
